course_title: Pediatric Primary Care Nurse Practitioner II
course_description: Students will focus on the management of common chronic conditions in infants, children and adolescents. Emphasis is on management skills and care team strategies to meet commonly diagnosed healthcare needs for this population in ambulatory, acute care clinic, or emergency room settings.
prerequisites: NRSG 664 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1738, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 2-4:20p, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
